Package Interfaces.VehicleCompany

Class Vehicle

java.lang.Object
Interfaces.VehicleCompany.Vehicle
All Implemented Interfaces:
TaxCalculation, Comparable<Vehicle>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bus, Minibus, Truck
public abstract class Vehicle extends Object implements TaxCalculation, Comparable<Vehicle>
This class represents a vehicle object.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Vehicle o)
      This method is taken from the Comparable interface. Compares this vehicle object with another vehicle object based on their prices.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Vehicle>
      Parameters:
      o - the object to be compared.
      Returns:
      a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this object's price is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified object's price.
